Signup.title: Create Account
Signup.success: User creation successful. Redirecting to login page.

validation.username-min: Username must be at least 3 characters long
validation.email-invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.password-min: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.password-uppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter
validation.password-lowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter
validation.password-number: Password must include at least one number

Document.non-document: No documents found. Please create a new document.
Document.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

Alert.session-expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
Alert.file-support: Currently, only PDF and text files are supported.
Alert.comment-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
Alert.file-already-uploaded: File is already uploaded. Please create a new document to upload a new file.

Error.session-expired: Your session has expired. Redirecting to login page.
Error.file-format-error: This file format cannot be previewed
Error.file-id-missing: File ID is not set. Please wait for the PDF to load completely and try again.
Error.document-id-missing: Document ID not found. Please create a document first.
Error.file-fetch-failed: Failed to load the file. Please try again.
Error.s3-upload-failed: Failed to upload file to storage. Please check your connection and try again.
Error.metadata-save-failed: Failed to save file information. Please try again.
Error.network-error: A network error occurred. Please check your connection.
Error.highlights-fetch-failed: Failed to load highlights. Please try again.
Error.document-info-fetch-failed: Failed to load document information. Please try again.
Error.highlight-save-failed: Failed to save highlight. Please try again.
Error.fetch-documents-failed: Failed to load documents. Please try again.
Error.create-document-failed: Failed to create document. Please try again.
Error.update-document-failed: Failed to update document. Please try again.
Error.delete-document-failed: Failed to delete document. Please try again.
Error.comment-save-failed: Failed to save comment. Please try again.
Error.dialogue-failed: Dialogue processing failed. Please try again.
Error.invalid-response-format: Invalid response format received. Please try again.
Error.update-comment-failed: Failed to update comment. Please try again.
Error.delete-comment-failed: Failed to delete comment. Please try again.
